00024 Point3DDecorator::Point3DDecorator() {
00025         this->point = new Point3D(); //create default point (0,0,0)
00026 }
00027 
00028 Point3DDecorator::Point3DDecorator(Point3D* point) :
00029                         Point3D (point) {
00030         this->decorate(point);
00031 //      this->point = new Point3D(point);
00032 }
00033 
00034 Point3DDecorator::Point3DDecorator(Point3DDecorator* point) {
00035 //      this->point = new Point3D(point);
00036         this->decorate(point->getPoint()); //?
00037 }
00038 
00039 Point3DDecorator::Point3DDecorator(const Point3DDecorator &point) {
00040         this->point = new Point3D(point);
00041 }
00042 
00043 Point3DDecorator& Point3DDecorator::operator=(Point3DDecorator &point) {
00044         *(this->point) = point;
00045 }
00046 
00047 Point3DDecorator::~Point3DDecorator() {
00048         if (point != 0) {
00049                 delete point;
00050                 point = 0;
00051         }
00052 }
00053 
00054 Point3D Point3DDecorator::operator+(const Point3D *point) {
00055         return this->point->operator +(point); //just a forward declaration
00056 }
00057 
00058 Point3D Point3DDecorator::operator-(const Point3D *point) {
00059         return this->point->operator -(point); //just a forward declaration
00060 }
00061 
00062 Point3D Point3DDecorator::operator *(double scalar) {
00063         return this->point->operator *(scalar); //just a forward declaration
00064 }
00065 
00066 Point3D& Point3DDecorator::operator=(const Point3D &point) {
00067         /*
00068          * This is a forward declaration, that prevents from assigning results to the super class of the decorator,
00069          * rather than to the next skin/layer/wrapper of the decorator. Otherwise data inconsistency might occur!
00070          */
00071         return this->point->operator =(point);
00072 }
00073

00081         return point->getY(); //just a forward declaration

00105         point->homogeneousTransformation(transformation); //just a forward declaration

00108 void Point3DDecorator::decorate(Point3D* point) {
00109         this->point = point;
00110 }

00112 Point3D* Point3DDecorator::getPoint() {
00113         return point;
